list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'elasticsearch'

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "elasticsearch_cluster_active_primary_shards" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "elasticsearch_cluster_active_shards" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "elasticsearch_cluster_relocating_shards" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "elasticsearch_cluster_unassigned_shards" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "elasticsearch_cluster_initializing_shards" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "elasticsearch_cluster_number_of_pending_tasks" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "lma_components_threads" WHERE "service" = 'elasticsearch' AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_memory_rss" WHERE "service" = 'elasticsearch' AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_disk_bytes_read" WHERE "service" = 'elasticsearch' AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_disk_bytes_write" WHERE "service" = 'elasticsearch' AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_cputime_syst" WHERE "service" = 'elasticsearch' AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "lma_components_cputime_user" WHERE "service" = 'elasticsearch' AND "hostname" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with key = environment_label

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from elasticsearch_check with key = "hostname" where environment_label =~ /^$environment$/

list.name: threadpool
list.query: show tag values from elasticsearch_thread_pool_queue with key = pool where environment_label =~ /^$environment$/
